MIME media type name : Text

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.dvb.subtitle

Required parameters : None

None

Encoding considerations : binary


Security considerations :
Local agreements between broadcasters and equipment manufacturers
determine the interpretation of the content of this type. As such, the
general security considerations for this type are impossible to assess.

Interoperability considerations :


Published specification :
GEM 1.2.2 - ETSI TS 102 728 v.1.1.1 (February 2010) â€¨available at
http://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/102700_102799/102728/01.01.01_60/ts_102728v010101p.pdf

Applications which use this media :
This media type is intended for use by implementers of devices, services
or applications compliant with the GEM and MHP specifications
